frontmatter.title: Enabling Early Hardware Development for Futuristic Data Center Applications
frontmatter.excerpt: Characterized widely-used data center applications (e.g. MySQL, MongoDB, FFmpeg, Nginx) and predicted how these applications might evolve in the future to enable suitable hardware development early on.

frontmatter.title: Redesigning the Branch Target Buffer for Data Center Applications
frontmatter.excerpt: Presented a novel BTB replacement policy that achieves near-ideal front-end processor performance for data center applications.
